basics.name: Parth P. Dode
basics.label: Master's Student
basics.summary: Master of Engineering Design student with extensive experience in software development and DevOps seeking a 12 month Co-op term for Fall 2024. Highly curious individual, proficient in multiple programming languages, cloud services, containerization technologies, with the ability to use the full range of Github functionality.

work.summary: Worked on Uptane OTA system and Kubernetes ecosystem for vehicle updates
highlights: Remodeled Uptane OTA system documentation, improving accessibility for new contributors
Mapped workflow of updating the TCU in Uptane's Kubernetes ecosystem, achieving 99.9% success rate in securing vehicle updates
Reduced deployment time by 75% and eliminated 98% of manual configuration errors through automation

work.position: Backend Engineering and Developer Operations Contractor
work.summary: Worked on AWS S3 data recovery and backend operations improvements
highlights: Automated AWS S3 data recovery, ensuring 100% data recovery on accidental server crashes
Improved backend operations, reducing server downtime to 1% through CRON job scheduling
Integrated Github Actions with Pytest for automated testing

work.summary: Worked on frontend and backend improvements
highlights: Increased site traffic by 200% through implementation of SVG line graphs
Developed a frontend design system in Node.js with test automation in Jest framework
Introduced GitHub Actions to automate issue management

work.summary: Worked on API implementations and Docker containerization
highlights: Collaborated on bug fixes and API demonstrations
Implemented API in 15+ frameworks in 5 separate languages
Reduced deployment time by 95% using Docker containers

work.summary: Worked on integrating Siemens's 'Jailhouse' hypervisor in Automotive Grade Linux OS
highlights: Integrated Siemens's 'Jailhouse' hypervisor in Automotive Grade Linux OS
Tested embedded system design with Qemu x86-64 and Raspberry Pi
Merged 1100+ lines of embedded C source code using Gerrit and JIRA

work.summary: Worked on Azure cloud services and backend development
highlights: Leveraged Azure cloud services to host C# .NET application with a MySQL database
Implemented APIs and user authentication backend

volunteer.summary: Working on Payload Deployment Design for Drones During Forest Fires
highlights: 3D printing designs with Prusa i3 MK3S+
